properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2021 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

dashlet.title: Organization:Overview:Users
dashlet.query: SELECT Person AS p JOIN User AS u ON u.contactid=p.id WHERE p.org_id=:this->id

field.filter: SELECT l FROM Location AS l JOIN Organization AS root ON l.org_id=root.id JOIN Organization AS child ON child.parent_id BELOW root.id WHERE child.id= :this->org_id

method.comment: /** * Overload the display of the properties to add a tab (the first one) * with the preview of the document */
